title: Mayor That Stabbed The Other Guy 28 Times

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- During the day, reveal yourself as a role that can reveal themselves. You may choose which role this is.
- Stab someone during the night.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- For the rest of the game, your vote counts as 3, a Doctor cannot heal you, and you cannot whisper or be whispered to.
- Your attack will appear to be that of a random role that uses knives.

desc:
Post 2905
*Converted from (2206) Mayor But With 28 Stab Wounds*
